titles.title: Preventing Vape Use Act
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require a recall of electronic nicotine delivery systems that have not been subject to premarket review, and for other purposes.
Preventing Vape Use Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Preventing Vape Use Act
This bill requires the Food and Drug Administration to order a mandatory recall of electronic nicotine delivery systems (e.g., e-cigarettes and vape pens) that have not successfully undergone premarket review.
